data.name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Marvel's Black Panther Movie Character and Level Pack
data.detailed_description: Download to get access to this level and character pack inspired by Marvel Studios' Black Panther. Set within the Kingdom of Wakanda, players will take the legendary Wakandan Super Hero and his sister Shuri on a dangerous mission within the darkest depths of their homeland, battling mutated creatures and arch-nemesis Erik Killmonger's vicious army.
data.about_the_game: Download to get access to this level and character pack inspired by Marvel Studios' Black Panther. Set within the Kingdom of Wakanda, players will take the legendary Wakandan Super Hero and his sister Shuri on a dangerous mission within the darkest depths of their homeland, battling mutated creatures and arch-nemesis Erik Killmonger's vicious army.
data.short_description: Set within the Kingdom of Wakanda, players will take the legendary Wakandan Super Hero and his sister Shuri on a dangerous mission within the darkest depths of their homeland, battling mutated creatures and arch-nemesis Erik Killmonger's vicious army.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processeur : Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent, AMD Athlon X4 740 (2 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 4 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB), Intel Iris Pro 5200 (shared), Radeon HD 5850 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX : Version 11
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 16 GB d'espace disque disponible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processeur : Intel Core i5-4570T (2*2900) or equivalent, AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 4 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB), Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • DirectX : Version 11
  • Réseau : Connexion internet haut débit
  • Espace disque : 16 GB d'espace disque disponible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : macOS 10.13.5
  • Processeur : 1.8GHz Intel Core i3 or better
  • Mémoire vive : 8 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : 1GB Nvidia 650M, 2GB AMD Radeon M290, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or better (see notes for more details)
  • Espace disque : 25 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Notes supplémentaires : The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
    • * All 13" MacBook Pros released since 2016
    • * All 15” Retina MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 15" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 with a 1GB Graphics Card
    • * All 21.5” iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 1.8GHz i3 processor or better
    • * All 27” iMacs released since Late 2013 (1)
    • * All 27" iMac Pros
    • * All Mac Pros released since Late 2013
    • 1. Late 2012 models with a Nvidia 675MX or Nvidia 680MX graphics cards are also supported.
    Please note for your computer to meet the minimum requirements it must match or better all elements of the listed system requirements. For more detailed specifications check the Feral website. ———
      The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
    • * All Mac Mini's since Late 2012
    • * All 12" MacBooks released since Early 2016
    • * All 13" MacBook Airs released since Mid 2012
    • * All 13" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 13” Retina MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 21’5” iMacs released since Early 2013
    ———
